titlestmt.titleproper: Social Science Research Council records, Record Group 3
A Guide to the Social Science Research Council records, Record Group 3 FA1577

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-07-23 00:03:31 -0400.

did.unittitle: Social Science Research Council records, Record Group 3

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records in Record Group 3 primarily consist of program and project files and administrative records often including: project proposals, conference and workshop papers and proposals, meeting records, surveys, correspondence and other research materials.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Social Science Research Council archives are arranged into three record groups distinguished by the date of their donation to the Archive Center. Accession 1 (Record Group 1) consists of the documents received by the Archive Center in 1990; Accession 2 (Record Group 2) was transferred to the Archive Center in 1994; Record Group 3 was transferred to the Archive Center in 2017-2018.
Record Group 3 consists of the following series:

Economics Initiative, Record Group 3, Series 1 (FA1196). East Asia/Indochina, Record Group 3, Series 2 (FA1481). AIDS, Record Group 3, Series 3 (FA1483). Committee on States and Social Structures, Record Group 3, Series 4 (FA1484).
Within series the records are primarily arranged in original order.
Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
